Sentence: he went to scapegoat at breath-taking speed. today , steve case officially out at aol time warner. the media giant remains in a rut. investigators looking for answers today at a shareholders meeting today in virginia. as we turn to greg clarkin , we 're talking about the home team here , cnn 's parent company , not easy for any of us to talk about .
